Name: fromRoleNames
Description: User list will be generated based on this list. If empty, all users will be loaded.

Name: componentId
Description: Id of user autocomplete.

Name: selectedUser
Description: Required input and output value for selected user.

Name: excludedUsernames
Description: Users to be excluded from user selection. This is applied if you use the default completeMethod.

Name: requiredMessage
Description: Message to be displayed when user autocomplete validation fails.

Name: forceSelection
Description: If true, only accepts user from the list.

Name: minQueryLength
Description: N"umber of characters to be typed before starting to offer autocomplete."

Name: completeMethod
Description: Method for user autocomplete.

Name: isDisabled
Description: If true, disable User Selection.

Name: isRequired
Description: If true, User Selection is required.

Name: isReadOnly
Description: If true, User Selection cannot be changed.

Name: isRenderedMessage
Description: If true, message for user field is rendered.

Name: hightlight
Description: If true, highlight the first suggested user automatically.

Name: floatingLabel
Description: If true, display label with floating style and labelPanelStyleClass can't be applied.

Name: autocompleteStyleClass
Description: Style class of user autocomplete.

Name: autoCompletePanelStyleClass
Description: Style class of user autocomplete panel.

Name: inputStyleClass
Description: Style class of user autocomplete input.

Name: labelPanelStyleClass
Description: Style class of label panel.

Name: labelStyleClass
Description: Style class of label.

Name: label
Description: Text of label for User Selection component.

Name: size
Description: Number of characters used to determine the width of the input element.

Name: messageStyleClass
Description: Style class of message.

Name: itemLabel
Description: Displayed text of selected user item and users in dropdown list.

Name: cache
Description: If true, autocomplete caches search result list.

Name: moreText
Description: The text shown in panel when the suggested list is greater than maxResults.

Name: queryDelay
Description: Delay in milliseconds before sending a query to the server.

Name: maxResults
Description: Maximum number of results to be displayed.

Name: scrollHeight
Description: scrollHeight attribute of primefaces autocomplete.

Name: hasCustomizedSelectionList
Description: If true, the customized selection list is displayed.

Name: isShowAvatarInSelectionList
Description:
| Boolean value to specify avatar showing. Set to true to show avatar.
| The setting will detect Portal setting Portal.ShowAvatar as its default value, refer to HowTo: Update :ref:`update-portal-settings` for more details.
| If the Portal setting is not available, defaults to true.

Name: displayNameRenderedInSelectionList
Description: If false, the name of security member in the selection list is hidden.

Name: displayNameInSelectionListStyleClass
Description: Style class of display name in the selection list

Name: selectionListContainerStyleClass
Description: Style class of item's container in the selection list

Name: emptyMessage
Description: Message to show when there's no option in selection list.
